entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Ice fog patches early this morning. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 then diminishing to 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
